Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Møller Hansen Mikkelsen's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Møller Hansen Mikkelsen is a 65 year old retired Private Equity Investor from Denmark. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Møller Hansen Mikkelsen and Ellen have been married since 1985. Their child is  named Lykke.
Education Background:
Møller obtained his secondary school diploma from Herning Gymnasium in 1979.
He then attended International Business Academy (IBA), which he graduated in 1983.
Occupation History:
Møller Hansen Mikkelsen is a seasoned professional with over 42 years of experience.
In 1983, Møller Hansen Mikkelsen started working as a Investment Banker at Nykredit A/S, marking the beginning of his successful career.
At Jyske Bank A/S, he held the position of Private Equity Investor from 1985 till retirement, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 5670000 DKK.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Greve, Næstved and Gladsaxe, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
